abstract.t: CRCP (Camera Recorder Control Protocol) is designed after FTP to be useful to operate realtime/batch analog/digital video cameras and video/audio recorders over the Internet. The design of CRCP is completely modular. A unit consists of several subunits and CRCP currently specifies units POWER, STREAM, TAPE and CAMERA. However, CRCP allows arbitrary combination of subunits to make it useful to control any home electronics units.
